tool_description: Parses grant guidelines and application instructions to extract structured requirements, forms, and submission specifications.

grant_id.description: Unique identifier of the grant opportunity

document_sections.description: Specific sections to extract (narrative, budget, forms, attachments, eligibility)

error_messages: Grant not found: The specified grant_id does not exist or guidelines are unavailable.
Invalid document sections: Must be one of 'narrative', 'budget', 'forms', 'attachments', 'eligibility'.
Invalid format preference: Must be one of 'detailed', 'checklist', 'timeline'.
Extraction failed: Unable to parse grant guidelines or requirements.
Incomplete guidelines: Some requirement sections may be missing or unclear in source documents.
usage: Provide grant_id as required parameter. Optionally specify document_sections array to focus extraction and format_preference for output style. The tool returns structured application requirements and specifications.

grant_title.description: Official title of the grant program

application_deadline.description: Application submission deadline in date-time format

required_documents.description: List of required documents and forms

narrative_requirements.description: Specific narrative section requirements and page limits

budget_specifications.description: Budget format requirements and allowed/disallowed expenses

submission_method.description: How and where to submit the application

page_limits.description: Page or word count limits for each section

evaluation_criteria.description: Criteria and weights used to evaluate applications

special_instructions.description: Any special formatting or submission instructions
